src_original: upaśamānusmṛtir,  ānāpānānusmṛtiḥ,  kāyagatānusmṛtir,  maraṇānusmṛtiḥ. etā ucyante daśānusmṛtayaḥ.  [DsP_23] tatra katame ṣaṭ saṃjñākārāḥ?  yadutānityasaṃjñā,
śabdo,  rasaḥ,  spraṣṭavyaṃ,  dharmā anityā iti yaj jñānam idam ucyate 'nvayajñānam.
yat parasattvānaṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetasi cetasikeṣu ca dharmeṣv avicikitsitaṃ jñānam idam ucyate paracittajñānam.
yat samudayasya prahāṇajñānam idam ucyate samudayajñānam.
